news_header: Kone's turnover grew by 5.9% to nearly EUR 3 billion, with adjusted operating profit around EUR 387 million.
news_original_title: Koneen liikevaihto kasvoi lähes kuudella prosentilla
news_text: In the last quarter of the year, Kone's turnover increased by 5.9% compared to the previous year, reaching nearly EUR 3 billion. The adjusted operating profit was approximately EUR 387 million, and orders received grew by 3.4%, totaling around EUR 2.1 billion. The company anticipates slight turnover growth this year. CEO Philippe Delorme noted that maintenance and modernization were key profit drivers, although the Chinese market posed challenges.
